dialogues.text: The ref moves a still screaming Adonis and counts.

dialogues.speaker: REFEREE
dialogues.text: One... Two... Three... Porter, on his hands and knees, tries to shake himself ba to his senses, blood leaking from his face onto the mat.

dialogues.speaker: REFEREE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Four... Five... Six... He pushes up from the ground to his feet. He shakes his h off again, opens his eyes wide for the ref to take a look

dialogues.speaker: REFEREE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You good to go? Porter nods convincingly. The Ref lets it continue. Holiday screams his head off at Porter.

dialogues.speaker: HOLIDAY
dialogues.text: Keep away from em’ Ricky! Porter ignores Holiday. He looks at Adonis with a lion’s eyes. They charge towards each other. Adonis leads in with a haymaker, Porter ducks it and tags with one of his own, sending Adonis stumbling back into t ropes. Porter attacks Adonis while he is off balance. It looks bad for Adonis, until he SLIPS a haymaker ducks pivots, leaving Porter’s left side wide open; Adonis unleashes a vicious four hit combination to Porter head and face LEFT-RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT sending Porter off th ropes and crumpling to the mat like a rag doll. The Ref sprints to stop the fight.  181 117.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: -Mary- Anne and Lisa going nuts. -Kayla and Daryl watching at home, running around like cr -Terrel watching in the Rec room, overjoyed.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO ANFIELD
dialogues.text: The crowd is raucous. Adonis raises his hands in celebrat joy- exhaustion. Bianca hurdles the gate and jumps into t ring, overjoyed. Both corners clear out. Rocky and Joe da in the ring, run up to Adonis embracing him. They can’t believe it. As the usual post-fight crowd of officials an reporters bombard the ring. The two fighters embrace. Ado breaks away, Bianca on one side, Rocky on the other, hold him up.

dialogues.speaker: RINGSIDE ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: And your winner, by way of Technical Knockout. Adonis “Creed” Johnson!

dialogues.speaker: MAX KELLERMAN
dialogues.text: A year ago, you were sitting ina Los Angeles dorm room. Now you stand before us a World Champion. Walk us through what was going through your head tonight...

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (out of breath, fractured) I just wanted to show my loved ones (long beat) who I am. Adonis looks up to the sky, points to the heavens. He lea on Amir and Joe Hand. A faint chant in the crowd can be m out, and starts to pick up volume.

dialogues.speaker: ROCKY
dialogues.text: Listen to em’.

dialogues.speaker: CREED... CREED... CREED... CREED
dialogues.text: Adonis looks around the stadium and sees the standing ovation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The long flight of stairs. A Rocky’s van pulls up. Adonis Bianca hop out, dressed in street clothes.  182 183 118. Small white bandages on his face cover his wounds. He ope the passenger door and helps Rocky, who wears a gray swea suit, and black beanie. He is slower and a bit thinner- h has started the chemo treatments again. Rocky balances himself with his left hand on Adonis’ righ shoulder. They stand at the foot of the steps. Rocky take deep breath. One step at a time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two are about halfway up the steps. Sweat has built u around Rocky’s neckline, his feet weigh a ton. He stops, turns away from Adonis, frustrated. He puts his hands ove his eyes. Adonis puts his hands around his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: ADONIS
dialogues.text: (sotto voce) You got this... come on... Rocky gathers himself with Adonis’ help, and they continu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adonis and Rocky take the last step up to the top plaza. Rocky completely out of breath, smiles. He pats Adonis on back, and walks towards the center of the plaza. Adonis gives him his space and looks down at Bianca, who leans u against the car and smiles at them. Rocky takes a couple more steps and smiles, he turns arou to face the city below, and raises his arms in victory. CUT TO BLACK.
